title: 2019 AFL Live Stream: Watch The Grand Final Live Here!
text:
Image: Foxtel

The AFL 2019 Grand Final is about to kick off between the Richmond Tigers and Greater Western Sydney Giants. If you're stuck at work this weekend or don't have access to a TV, it's still possible to watch the match live on your tablet or smartphone with just a few clicks. Here are the links!

The easiest way to stream the AFL Grand Final is to sign up to the AFL Live Official App. This costs $4.99 per week or you can snap up an annual pass for $99.99. The app is compatible with most Android, iOS, Mac and Windows devices.

You can also follow the action indirectly via the AFL website which provides live scores, stats and audio coverage.

If you're planning to watch after the live broadcast, get the Kayo Sports app which currently comes with a free two-week trial.
